title: Episode 131: Where is Don Lewis? Does Carole Baskin Know? Mini Morbid (Not Really)
description:
Tiger King was a trip. But what the hell happened to Don Lewis? A lot of speculation and a complete lack of evidence has made for a truly compelling mystery in the disappearance of Carole Baskin's second husband, Don. Tonight, we discuss the hype, the mystery and the craziness that is this case.

Check out our sponsors!
